item.title: Player Rights Question
item.dc:creator: @VelocityX VelocityX
item.description:
@VelocityX wrote:

[quote=“slay603, post:4, topic:335333”]Velocity thanks for the help, but thats not what I wanted. I simply wanted to make a Member player rights along with have a player… so when ppl yell there is a difference… the difference being if they are registerd on the forum or not. So all I did was add 2 different types of player rights. Replacing owner with co owner, and making a completely new one for owner. So… idk if you understand what im trying to do… but i want to have 5 different types of playerRights… and im trying to figure out how to implement them

Owner of Ecoscape[/quote]

You are going to have to mess with MySQL for something like that… and trust me, its not a walk in the park :\

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights Question
item.dc:creator: @VelocityX VelocityX
item.description:
@VelocityX wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (playerRights == 0) {
if(member == 0) {
yell("[Player] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
}
if (playerRights == 1){
yell(”[Mod] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
yell(”[Admin] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
yell(”[Owner] “+playerName+”: "+ command.substring(5));
}
}
else if (muted) {
sM(“You can’t yell your are muted.”);

}[/code]

There, I fixed it for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights Question
item.dc:creator: @slay603 slay603
item.description:
@slay603 wrote:

Ok, this is what i want to happen.

[code]if(command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (playerRights == 0) {
if(member == 0) {
yell("[Player] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
}
if (playerRights == 1){
yell(”[Member] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
yell(”[Mod] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
yell(”[Admin] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
if (playerRights == 4) {
yell(”[Co Owner] “+playerName+”: “+ command.substring(5));
}
if (playerRights == 5) {
yell(”[Owner] “+playerName+”: "+ command.substring(5));
}
}
else if (muted) {
sM(“You can’t yell your are muted.”);

}[/code]

How do I go about making these player rights exist in game, and how do I make the little admin and mod crown go to player right 5 and 3?

to do this i need to make more player rights, and swap the crowns around… is this able to be edited on a 317? im pretty new to coding and would like some help.

Owner of Ecoscape

Read full topic
